table.name: iam_menu
table.sql: SELECT id, code, name, h_quick_index, fd_level, parent_id, type, sort, is_default, icon, route, h_custom_flag, h_tenant_id, h_level_path, h_virtual_flag, h_controller_type, h_permission_type, h_description, h_enabled_flag, category FROM iam_menu WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY t.h_level_path

table.name: iam_menu
table.sql: SELECT id, code, name, h_quick_index, fd_level, parent_id, type, sort, is_default, icon, route, h_custom_flag, h_tenant_id, h_level_path, h_virtual_flag, h_controller_type, h_permission_type, h_description, h_enabled_flag, category FROM iam_menu WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY t.h_level_path

table.name: iam_menu_permission
table.sql: SELECT id, menu_id, permission_code FROM iam_menu_permission

table.name: iam_role
table.sql: SELECT id, NAME, CODE, description, fd_level, h_tenant_id, h_inherit_role_id, h_parent_role_id, h_parent_role_assign_level, h_parent_role_assign_level_val, is_enabled, is_modified, is_enable_forbidden, is_built_in, is_assignable, h_level_path, h_inherit_level_path, created_by_tenant_id, tpl_role_name FROM iam_role

table.name: iam_role_permission
table.sql: SELECT id, role_id, permission_id, h_create_flag, h_inherit_flag, type FROM iam_role_permission

table.name: hpfm_lov
table.sql: SELECT lov_id, lov_code, lov_type_code, route_name, lov_name, description, tenant_id, parent_lov_code, parent_tenant_id, custom_sql, custom_url, value_field, display_field, must_page_flag, enabled_flag, translation_sql FROM hpfm_lov

table.name: hpfm_lov_value
table.sql: SELECT lov_value_id, lov_id, lov_code, value, meaning, description, tenant_id, tag, order_seq, parent_value, start_date_active, end_date_active, enabled_flag FROM hpfm_lov_value

table.name: hpfm_lov_view_header
table.sql: SELECT view_header_id, view_code, view_name, lov_id, tenant_id, value_field, display_field, title, width, height, page_size, delay_load_flag, children_field_name, enabled_flag FROM hpfm_lov_view_header

table.name: hpfm_lov_view_line
table.sql: SELECT view_line_id, view_header_id, tenant_id, lov_id, display, order_seq, field_name, query_field_flag, table_field_flag, table_field_width, enabled_flag FROM hpfm_lov_view_line

sheet.name: prompt
sheet.table:
SELECT prompt_id, tenant_id, prompt_key, prompt_code, lang, description FROM hpfm_prompt AND lang != 'ja_JP'
prompt_id>
tenant_id,prompt_key,prompt_code,lang

table.name: hpfm_permission_rule
table.sql: SELECT rule_id, rule_code, rule_type_code, rule_name, description, sql_value, tenant_id, enabled_flag FROM hpfm_permission_rule

table.name: hpfm_permission_range
table.sql: SELECT range_id, custom_rule_flag, table_name, sql_id, description, tenant_id, service_name, enabled_flag FROM hpfm_permission_range

table.name: hpfm_permission_rel
table.sql: SELECT permission_rel_id, range_id, rule_id, editable_flag FROM hpfm_permission_rel

table.name: hpfm_code_rule
table.sql: SELECT rule_id, rule_code, rule_name, rule_level, tenant_id, description FROM hpfm_code_rule

table.name: hpfm_code_rule_dist
table.sql: SELECT rule_dist_id, rule_id, level_code, level_value, used_flag, enabled_flag, description FROM hpfm_code_rule_dist

table.name: hpfm_code_rule_detail
table.sql: SELECT rule_detail_id, rule_dist_id, order_seq, field_type, field_value, date_mask, seq_length, start_value, current_value, reset_frequency, reset_date, encrypted_flag FROM hitf_interface_server

table.name: fd_language
table.sql: SELECT id, code, name, description FROM fd_language

table.name: hpfm_static_text
table.sql: SELECT text_id, text_code, title, description, parent_id, start_date, end_date, parent_ids, tenant_id, company_id FROM hpfm_static_text

table.name: hpfm_static_text_value
table.sql: SELECT text_value_id, text_id, lang, title, description, text FROM hpfm_static_text_value

table.name: hpfm_tenant
table.sql: SELECT tenant_id, tenant_num, tenant_name, enabled_flag FROM hpfm_tenant

table.name: hpfm_group
table.sql: SELECT group_id, group_num, group_name, tenant_id, unit_id, source_key, source_code, enabled_flag, core_flag FROM hpfm_group

table.name: hpfm_tenant_config
table.sql: SELECT tenant_config_id, tenant_id, config_key, config_value FROM hpfm_tenant_config WHERE tenant_id=0

table.name: hpfm_dashboard_card
table.sql: SELECT id, CODE, fd_level, catalog_type, name, description, w, h, enabled_flag, logo, tenant_id, card_params FROM hpfm_dashboard_card

table.name: hpfm_dashboard_clause
table.sql: SELECT clause_id, clause_code, clause_name, data_tenant_level, menu_code, route, stats_expression, doc_remark_expression, enabled_flag, remark, tenant_id FROM hpfm_dashboard_clause

table.name: hpfm_dashboard_card_clause
table.sql: SELECT id, card_id, clause_id, order_seq FROM hpfm_dashboard_card_clause

table.name: oauth_client
table.sql: SELECT id, name, organization_id, resource_ids, secret, scope, authorized_grant_types, web_server_redirect_uri, access_token_validity, refresh_token_validity, additional_information, auto_approve, enabled_flag, access_roles, pwd_replay_flag, time_zone FROM oauth_client

table.name: oauth_ldap
table.sql: SELECT id, name, organization_id, server_address, port, account, ldap_password, use_ssl, is_enabled, base_dn, directory_type, object_class, custom_filter, saga_batch_size, connection_timeout, uuid_field, login_name_field, real_name_field, email_field, phone_field FROM oauth_ldap

table.name: oauth_password_policy
table.sql: SELECT id, code, name, organization_id, original_password, min_length, max_length, max_error_time, digits_count, lowercase_count, uppercase_count, special_char_count, not_username, regular_expression, not_recent_count, enable_password, enable_security, enable_lock, locked_expire_time, enable_captcha, max_check_captcha, enable_web_multiple_login, enable_app_multiple_login, password_update_rate, password_reminder_period, force_modify_password FROM oauth_password_policy

table.name: hpfm_form_header
table.sql: SELECT form_header_id, form_code, form_name, form_group_code, form_description, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hpfm_form_header WHERE enabled_flag = 1 AND tenant_id = 0

table.name: hpfm_form_line
table.sql: SELECT form_line_id, form_header_id, item_code, item_name, item_description, order_seq, item_type_code, required_flag, updatable_flag, default_value, value_constraint, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hpfm_form_line WHERE enabled_flag = 1 AND tenant_id = 0

table.name: hpfm_config
table.sql: SELECT config_id, tenant_id, config_code, config_value, category FROM hpfm_config WHERE tenant_id =0

table.name: hitf_interface_server
table.sql: SELECT interface_server_id, tenant_id, server_code, server_name, service_type, domain_url, soap_namespace, soap_element_prefix, enabled_flag, service_category, namespace, enabled_certificate_flag, certificate_id, swagger_url, public_flag FROM hitf_interface_server

table.name: hitf_interface
table.sql: SELECT interface_id, tenant_id, interface_server_id, interface_code, interface_name, interface_url, publish_type, request_method, request_header, enabled_flag, soap_version, soap_action, STATUS, remark, mapping_class FROM hitf_interface

table.name: hitf_interface_auth
table.sql: SELECT interface_auth_id, interface_id, tenant_id, auth_level, auth_level_value, auth_type, grant_type, access_token_url, client_id, client_secret, auth_username, auth_password, soap_wss_password_type, soap_username, soap_password, remark, password_encode_type FROM hitf_interface_auth

table.name: hsdr_executor
table.sql: SELECT executor_id, executor_code, executor_name, order_seq, executor_type, address_list, STATUS, tenant_id, server_name FROM hsdr_executor

table.name: hsdr_job_info
table.sql: SELECT job_id, executor_id, job_code, job_cron, description, job_param, alarm_email, executor_strategy, fail_strategy, glue_type, job_handler, cycle_flag, start_date, end_date, tenant_id, parent_id, strategy_param, serial, expand_param, init_flag FROM hsdr_job_info

table.name: hsdr_conc_executable
table.sql: SELECT executable_id, executable_code, executable_name, executable_desc, executor_id, executor_strategy, fail_strategy, strategy_param, exe_type_code, job_handler, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hsdr_conc_executable

table.name: hsdr_concurrent
table.sql: SELECT concurrent_id, executable_id, conc_code, conc_name, conc_description, alarm_email, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hsdr_concurrent t

table.name: hsdr_conc_param
table.sql: SELECT conc_param_id, concurrent_id, order_seq, param_code, param_name, param_format_code, param_edit_type_code, notnull_flag, business_model, value_filed_from, value_filed_to, show_flag, tenant_id, enabled_flag FROM hsdr_conc_param

table.name: hmsg_email_server
table.sql: SELECT server_id, server_code, server_name, host, port, protocol, try_times, username, password_encrypted, sender, enabled_flag, filter_strategy, tenant_id FROM hmsg_email_server

table.name: hmsg_email_property
table.sql: SELECT property_id, server_id, property_code, property_value, tenant_id FROM hmsg_email_property

table.name: hmsg_sms_server
table.sql: SELECT server_id, server_code, server_name, server_type_code, end_point, access_key, access_key_secret, sign_name, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hmsg_sms_server

table.name: hmsg_message_template
table.sql: SELECT template_id, template_code, template_name, template_title, template_content, message_category_code, message_subcategory_code, external_code, sql_value, lang, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hmsg_message_template

table.name: hmsg_template_arg
table.sql: SELECT arg_id, template_id, arg_name, description FROM hmsg_template_arg

table.name: hmsg_receive_config
table.sql: SELECT receive_id, receive_code, receive_name, default_receive_type, parent_receive_id, tenant_id, level_number, editable_flag FROM hmsg_receive_config

table.name: hmsg_receiver_type
table.sql: SELECT receiver_type_id, type_code, type_name, type_mode_code, route_name, api_url, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hmsg_receiver_type

table.name: hmsg_template_server
table.sql: SELECT temp_server_id, tenant_id, message_code, message_name, enabled_flag FROM hmsg_template_server

table.name: hmsg_template_server_line
table.sql: SELECT temp_server_line_id, temp_server_id, type_code, template_code, server_id, remark, server_code FROM hmsg_template_server_line WHERE type_code = 'EMAIL'

table.name: hmsg_template_server_line
table.sql: SELECT temp_server_line_id, temp_server_id, type_code, template_code, server_id, remark, server_code FROM hmsg_template_server_line WHERE type_code = 'SMS'

table.name: hmsg_template_server_line
table.sql: SELECT temp_server_line_id, temp_server_id, type_code, template_code, server_id, remark, server_code FROM hmsg_template_server_line WHERE type_code != 'SMS' and type_code != 'EMAIL'

table.name: hmsg_wechat_enterprise
table.sql: SELECT server_id, server_code, server_name, auth_type, corpid, corpsecret, auth_address, callback_url, enabled_flag, tenant_id, agent_id FROM hmsg_wechat_enterprise

table.name: hmsg_wechat_official
table.sql: SELECT server_id, server_code, server_name, auth_type, appid, secret, auth_address, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hmsg_wechat_official

table.name: himp_template_header
table.sql: SELECT id, template_code, template_name, enabled_flag, template_type, prefix_patch, description, tenant_id, template_url, fragment_flag FROM himp_template_header

table.name: himp_template_target
table.sql: SELECT id, header_id, sheet_index, sheet_name, datasource_code, table_name, rule_script_code, enabled_flag FROM himp_template_target

table.name: himp_template_line
table.sql: SELECT id, target_id, column_index, column_name, column_code, column_type, length, enabled_flag, nullable_flag, validate_flag, change_data_flag, max_value, min_value, validate_set, regular_expression, tenant_id, format_mask, sample_data, description FROM himp_template_line

table.name: hrpt_dataset
table.sql: SELECT dataset_id, dataset_code, dataset_name, datasource_code, sql_text, query_params, meta_columns, sql_type, enabled_flag, remark, tenant_id FROM hrpt_dataset

table.name: hrpt_report
table.sql: SELECT report_id, report_uuid, report_type_code, report_code, report_name, dataset_id, meta_columns, OPTIONS, template_type_code, page_flag, limit_rows, enabled_flag, order_seq, remark, tenant_id FROM hrpt_report

table.name: hrpt_report_permission
table.sql: SELECT permission_id, report_id, tenant_id, role_id, start_date, end_date, remark FROM hrpt_report_permission

table.name: hrpt_template
table.sql: SELECT template_id, template_type_code, template_code, template_name, enabled_flag, remark, tenant_id FROM hrpt_template

table.name: hrpt_template_dtl
table.sql: SELECT template_dtl_id, template_id, template_url, template_content, lang, enabled_flag, tenant_id FROM hrpt_template_dtl

table.name: hrpt_report_template
table.sql: SELECT report_template_id, report_id, template_id, default_flag, tenant_id FROM hrpt_report_template

table.name: hfle_storage_config
table.sql: SELECT storage_config_id, storage_code, storage_type, domain, end_point, access_key_id, access_key_secret, app_id, region, bucket_prefix, tenant_id, default_flag, access_control, prefix_strategy, create_bucket_flag FROM hfle_storage_config

table.name: hfle_capacity_config
table.sql: SELECT capacity_config_id, tenant_id, total_capacity, total_capacity_unit, storage_unit, storage_size FROM hfle_capacity_config

table.name: hfle_upload_config
table.sql: SELECT upload_config_id, tenant_id, bucket_name, DIRECTORY, content_type, storage_unit, storage_size, file_format FROM hfle_upload_config
